description: Combine and display contents of multiple directories and files in Markdown format
config.maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size (in bytes) to process
config.directoryStructure.showFileExtens: Whether to show file extensions in the directory structure.
config.prefixText.description: Text to be added at the beginning of the generated Markdown.
config.useGitignore.description: Use patterns from .gitignore file to exclude files
config.useVscodeignore.description: Use patterns from .vscodeignore file to exclude files
config.enableCompression: Remove comments and other code elements (Tree-sitter)
config.gitDiff.range.description: Git revision range (e.g. 'origin/main..HEAD'). Empty for working tree changes.
